website_summaries.verdict: It costs more than other options, but it delivers a high level of performance and protection.
pros: Advanced materials protect well against drops and will keep your iPhone X better protected than cheaper options
Reinforcement along the edges resists cracks
Guards nicely against fingerprints and skin oils sticking to the screen
cons: Quite a bit more expensive than other options
May not fit well with certain cases

customer_reviews.title: No cracks here!!!
customer_reviews.text: The very first thing I do when I buy any electronic is get a zagg screen protector. Not only does it make your phone look cleaner there’s a sense of security because you’re not constantly worried about breaking your screen. Over the past few years I have had to order several replacements and it’s no problem you pay five dollars for shipping and it comes in the mail 2-3 days later.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: I originally bought a different one due to the poor reviews of this zagg product
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought a different one due to the poor reviews of this zagg product. Well I'm back because the knock off sucked so bad. I'm not sure why the poor reviews, but zagg has always had high quality stuff. The new position jig is sweet and the screen edges are rounded so they aren't sharp. Never straying away from zagg again:
customer_reviews.author: Zach Chipman

customer_reviews.title: Works Like a Charm!
customer_reviews.text: Great Screen protector. Feel like the glass on my screen is indestructible. Make sure to have no dust or be in a dusty area when putting on protector. Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: DOOOODEE

customer_reviews.title: Best iPhone X Screen Protector
customer_reviews.text: This deserves a 5 star review. The protector is cut to fit my iPhone X’s screen perfectly. I’m thinking some of the other reviewers didn’t install it right. Just make sure you take you’re time when applying and feel free to reapply till you get it exactly right. The dust removal sticker is a godsend! I’ve been using Zagg for my past 2 iPhones as well as a Speck candy shell case. I have had several 3-6 foot drops and my phone has never been damaged. Zagg is also very high quality and doesn’t show wear over time like most screen protectors.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. Perfect instructions. Wish I would have known there was other stronger versions as this is the Glass +. The HD and privacy would have been better. However still a solid product. Also have family members who have used ZAGG products.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Everyone Need to protect the screen on the iPhone X
customer_reviews.text: As expected......took a little while to seat properly but is doing fine now.....IPhone X is wonderful....
customer_reviews.author: Ernest C. Seals

customer_reviews.title: Best thing to get especially if you are putting you ...
customer_reviews.text: Best thing to get especially if you are putting you screen protector on yourself. It came with a frame to put the phone in so it would be centered and would fit well with my case on. Went on super easy and also came with great cleaning things to prepare the screen
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Hulsey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and very high quality
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality screen protector for the iPhone X. It applies very easily; the tabs already installed on outside of the screen protector make it easy to align properly. Doesn't cover up the iPhone X sensors either. Also have Zagg screen protectors installed on wife's iPhone 8 Plus and daughter's iPhone 6 Plus.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: I normally buy ZNitro and decided to purchase this one ...
customer_reviews.text: I normally buy ZNitro and decided to purchase this one due to a highly recommendation from my techie co-worker. Hello ZAGG and goodbye ZNitro. I dropped my old phone once with ZNitro and one of the edge cracked (temper glass only). I dropped my new phone with ZAGG and nothing whatsoever cracked. That along impressed and convince me to use this product in the near future because knowing me I will buy the next upgrade of iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: I can’t even believe it. I have a brand ...
customer_reviews.text: Update for a former poor review. I thought my phone had shattered, but upon further inspection I realize my shield cracked in two places, not my iPhone X screen, which means it absolutely did it’s job. I called ZAGG immediately and they said they’d send me a replacement immediately. Brand new phone. Thank heavens for this screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Scoggins

customer_reviews.title: Ugh..
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased Zagg screen protectors religiously for the past 10+ years without any issues. They've always been the best for protection as well as warranty coverage - which not a lot of people would expect for a screen protector. Unfortunately, this item came with blemishes already in the adhesive of the screen protector as well as a lack of equal adhesive across the entire protector which has caused the corners to bubble up and refuses to stay down. I've rated this product with one star due to the fact that in order to get this item replaced, it is an out of pocket expense for me which doesn't seem right when my original purchase came in an unsatisfactory manner.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Cracks without even dropping it.
customer_reviews.text: Zagg is supposed to be one of the best screen protectors out there. I’ve had it on for 3 days, haven’t dropped my phone at all, and now there’s a huge crack running from corner to corner.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly34

customer_reviews.title: Chipped in less than 30 days
customer_reviews.text: Received November 1 2018. Paid $17. (Now listed at $11.69) Not sure what happened. I've dropped the phone a few times, but never onto a sharp or protruding object - just the flat floor. I noticed a small chip on the edge of the protector, that has grown a little since. Not as durable as I had hoped, and the warranty process requires paying shipping for the return and then the shipping for the replacement - the total of these two transactions will exceed the $11.69 new purchase price. The warranty claim cost and process is a bit of a farce. Bummed about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Business -.

customer_reviews.title: Skip this brand name.
customer_reviews.text: They are just living off the name name the quality isn’t any better than any of the other glass products. Cracked when dropped less than 2’ in the yard. Save your money on the brand name. I am more than happy after returning this for a refund and getting a 3 pack of the much cheaper version of the same product. Also when I contacted zag they wanted me to pay about $8 shipping for the free lifetime replacement. No thanks I’ll buy 3 from Amazon at that price.
customer_reviews.author: CommentFromJohn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! It came with everything necessary to install easily. Including a nifty plastic frame that helps align the glass on the phone. There was a wet wipe, a microfiber cloth and a sticker to lift the last bits of dust before applying the glass. It fits perfectly in the Otterbox Defender. There’s a tiny gap between the glass and the plastic edge of the case, but that should be easy to clean with a Q tip when needed. The screen looks and works better than it did when I had a case with a built-in plastic screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: When I purchase the item it was a great deal and now I see why. The item came with a chip on the edge of the screen protector and it’s not even the newest model of the screen protector. I just purchased one from the Verizon store and it had an alignment tray and the unit went in with ease. Would return but it’s more of a was of time to file a claim and repackage this send back. I guess I’ll just have to go buy one from the Verizon store again.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Emerson

customer_reviews.title: don't buy this!
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered Zagg screen protectors and they have a lifetime warranty. I had one replaced with no problems. went to have another replaced and they wouldn't replace it. So I ordered another one. within 2 days(and no, I didn't not drop it), my screen was cracked in the bottom right corner. don't waste your money on this. I sent it back to Amazon and got a full refund. ordered another brand.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice unit. The installation is as easy as it gets. A guide plate comes with the screen for easy installation. My only complaint is that the guide plate would not snap on to the phone as advertised. However, it helped and as an easy install. The adhesion appears to be very good. It didn't move after setting it on the phone's glass. Plus, the protector is very strong and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not durable.
customer_reviews.text: Not the best screen protector for the price. I bought this late August and in October it was scratched. I had it in my pocket with keys and when I pulled it out it had a nice scratch going from one side to the other. Wont buy again. It is definitely not very sturdy and I dont want to have to replace it every two months. The only good thing about it was that my actual screen wasn't hurt.
customer_reviews.author: MamaZ

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usually writer reviews but I’m disappointed with how badly these scratch. Anything that touches the glass leaves scratch marks. Bought for 3 phones and each is all scratched up within 2 weeks. I’ve always used Zagg for years and have never had this problem. Warranty is amazing and I have used it when cracking the glass and even then they weren’t as scratched up as this one. I don’t feel I should have to pay shipping for warranty replacement on a product I’ve had in the phones for less than 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Zoraya Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Peeling off after only 45 days.
customer_reviews.text: Have owned one before on previous iPhone and it was flawless. Bought two when my wife and I got new iPhones. Mine went on perfect and I had no bubbles. About a two inch section on the side has now peeled away for no reason. My phone hasn’t been dropped or anything else to maybe initiate this separation so I don’t know what’s going on. Ironically my wife’s went on ok but she had a millimeter or so along one side of the glass that never did adhere to the phone surface. So far hers doesn’t appear to have worsened. I would like a replacement but of course this happened just outside of the return window. :(
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am not new to using a screen protector for iphones. I placed the cover, after wiping it with cleaner and using their dust catcher. I could not get rid of a line of bubbles, used a bubble scrapper todo away with it, wouldnt work. I decided to let it be, but there were certain letters it would not connect, so texting wasnt working. I removed the cover, it would not stick back on, adhesive was minimal, next thing i noticed, it had fallen off and got lost. I had it exactly one day!
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: Pain to install
customer_reviews.text: If you purchase this, go to apple to have them put the screen protector on for free. Very disappointed it’s advertised to come with an easy install kit & that was NOT the case. Still attempted to install myself, I turned off any fans/AC and as soon as I peeled the film off small particles of dust attached themsleves to the protector. Luckily it didn’t cause any bubbles, but it makes my screen look dirty. The screen protector is very sleek and great quality. Make sure to register the screen protector with ZAGG to be able to replace it if anything happens to yours.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Hesse

customer_reviews.title: Consistently the best!
customer_reviews.text: I've used Zagg a couple times over the years, and it consistently holds up! No matter how many times I drop my phone, the only thing that ever cracks is the screen. Even then, the quality screen protector isn't easily scratched or cracked. I love the plastic frame that's included to help place the screen on my phone without having to worry about lining it up perfectly (since the frame does the heavy lifting for me)! I will forever use Zagg for my screen protector needs.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Holt

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product and easy install!
customer_reviews.text: They just keep making products easier to install and extremely durable! I’m so impressed! I was holding my nephew and he was messing around with my phone, dropped it on the tile floor and there’s only a very tiny chip in the top right corner of the screen protector. I was shocked! I recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: RHSK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The size is perfect (I have an iPhone X) and it's very responsive. I've dropped the phone a few times since it was installed and the glass didn't even crack. It's the best glass I've used so far. It was worth the price. Normally, I drop my phone, the glass cracks or chips and I replace it. So this is working out very well for me.
customer_reviews.author: JDChurch

customer_reviews.title: Glass invisible shield
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install after watching the video. Had the shield on my phone for less than a month and pulled it out of my pocket and the glass had cracked which was a bummer. But I did register it for replacement and it was easy to request replacement on Zagg’s website. Only had to pay $6 for shipping. Hoping this one last me longer. Shield is very clear and responds appropriately to touch. Fits screen well. Overall I’m pretty happy with it. It’s protecting my phone so it’s doing it’s job!
customer_reviews.author: Procter/Bushroe

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply!
customer_reviews.text: Way better than buy those third party glass screen protectors. It made my phone stand out so much better and the screen is looking great and it was easy to apply with the help of the plastic red screen protector helper that helps you apply the screen protector so you get it right to where it needs to be.
customer_reviews.author: Craft

customer_reviews.title: Not cracked up to be as good as the company says
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one I have purchased and the third one that has cracked. I am not hard on my phone. I always keep it in a case and it looks brand new. I just bought one June 23 and I am purchasing a new one today because of a chip.
customer_reviews.author: deby lopa

customer_reviews.title: The screen protector cracked within a week. I was ...
customer_reviews.text: The screen protector cracked within a week. I was very upset because I thought this product was produced with some quality. I don’t want a replacement because I don’t want the screen protector to crack again within a week.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: When I first bought this screen protector, I messed up the application process. I figured the best bet was to try and take it off without breaking it (which was a long shot), but it worked!! I was able to remove it AND reapply it WITHOUT breaking the glass screen protector! The second application went on beautifully and it adhered perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Aliyah

customer_reviews.title: Easiest screen protector installation ever
customer_reviews.text: I've used several different screen protectors on my phones. This was by far the easiest one to use. Too new to provide feedback on how well it holds up over time but- so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: fgordon

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product matter how many times I tried to reinstall it numerous air bubbles underneath. Don’t waste your money. I have used this company’s products for years and love them which was why I was willing to pay a little bit more for a screen protector that the product was nothing like their previous products
customer_reviews.author: cangell

customer_reviews.title: Zagg for life
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased the Zagg screen protector for all of my phones. Knock on wood, have yet to crack a screen yet, only the glass protector has ever been damaged! The lifetime warranty is a great deal as I've had to replace a few of the protectors over the years. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon L.

customer_reviews.title: Not protective AT ALL! Actual phone screen cracked when dropped on carpet!!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my old screen protector (which was amazing, but unfortunately they were out of stock) so I thought I’d give this a try. I installed the Zagg screen shield two nights ago on my iPhone X, dropped my phone this morning on CARPET and my actual phone screen has a huge crack from the upper right corner to bottom left. I am so disappointed, horrible quality especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product since I purchased my phone a couple years back. This is now my second. The first withstood tons of drops and was left with cracks. When I took the protector off I was expecting screen damage as well. To my surprise no screen damage and the new one went on smoothly!
customer_reviews.author: Olliesworld1011

customer_reviews.title: Love ZAGG
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd phone I've used with zagg screen protectors and I love them. You can still use the zagg website too if the protector cracks, they will send you a new one free of charge (you pay shipping), and all you have to do is send the old one back. I've had an iPhone for 8+ years now and have yet to crack one, I have to think zagg has everything to do with that.
customer_reviews.author: I hate it

customer_reviews.title: Waste of my $$
customer_reviews.text: Just flushed $17 down the toilet. It’s probably a great product if you can get it set on the screen without bubbles. I’ll have to pay twice as much now to have someone who knows what they are doing put one on. Glass broke on about the 10th time I had to pick the glass up to try to remove bubbles. Pushing them out was not working. I’m sure it protects the phone screen well enough if it can be set right.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C. Mlynczak

customer_reviews.title: Seems legit
customer_reviews.text: With Amazon's ongoing counterfeiting issues its tough to know if you will receive a knockoff or legit product since all products with the same SKU are mixed from different sellers. The product I received seems legit and works well. The plastic frame was useful in guiding the application of the screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: Jando

customer_reviews.title: It is way too small for my X
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a nice screen protector but it’s way too small for my phone, which is an X. I put a 3 on durability because I haven’t dropped it yet so idk but seems well made. I put it on thinking it wouldn’t bug me too bad, I’m not that picky, but it’s just too small. It would be nice to be able to get a new one sent that’s bigger or a refund without needing to remove this one and leave my phone entirely unprotected in the meantime.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah K.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic screen protector, somehow accidently bought it while looking for a pixel 2 XL screen protector. Surprisingly it does not fit a phone it was not designed for. Applied it to my girlfriend's phone and it worked exactly how is was supposed to. Still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Nick D.

customer_reviews.title: Pay close attention when applying
customer_reviews.text: This is nice, but I couldn’t give it 5 stars because there is nothing that indicates the top vs. bottom. I applied it so damn perfectly until I lifted up and realized the camera slot cutout was on the bottom of the screen instead of on the top. This should be better marked on the packaging so someone doesn’t mistakenly put it on upside down, like I did. Shoot!
customer_reviews.author: Jacy

customer_reviews.title: NONONO, doesn’t work on iPhone X
customer_reviews.text: On first application the screen didn’t line up correctly. This comes with a tray that is supposed to center the screen to fit the phone, this didn’t work and the screen wouldn’t seal on the edges. I contacted Zagg and they did send a code for a free replacement so I figured that this was just a one-time occurrence. Now on my second screen for this IphoneX I again followed the instructions and used the tray and again the edges won’t seal ! I think the screen is unable to adhere to the bevel sides, secondly the screen is not center. It’s slightly off, just as it was the last time I used their provided tray.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlyn

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: To be fair, my phone screen itself hasn't broken, but this screen protector breaks more easily than any screen protector I've ever had! Two broke in the span of two months, so I finally switched brands and the other brand has lasted 6 months now. Maybe if someone had a thicker case where the screen protector didn't stick out as much it wouldn't be an issue, but my experience with this screen protector has not been great. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and high quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, that was the easiest screen protector I've ever had to install, didn't really have to read the instructions, very self explanatory based on the items, but yeah, definitely read the instructions just to be on the safe side. But again, very easy install! I've always purchased Zagg, for many years now because it protects the phone screen. My kids have dropped their phones before, and it's happened twice that the screen protector shatters, but NOT the phone screen, so definitely worth buying quality!
customer_reviews.author: Rodolfo Guardiola

customer_reviews.title: OEM - Screen Protector good price
customer_reviews.text: The screen protector came as advertised. It was OEM. Packaged from original seller (ZAGG) registered product on ZAGG website as I have with previous ZAGG products. ZAGG honors their replacement policy. Seller was prompt and delivered earlier than I anticipated - great!
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent in every way on my iPhone. This is my second one works sooooo well since I am so clumsy....to date my cell has not needed to be fixed or replaced. This product really lives up to its purpose!:)
customer_reviews.author: Maria Campana

customer_reviews.title: Super easy install
customer_reviews.text: I have never successfully been able to apply screen protectors myself. I always have to take them to the store to be done properly (without dust, straight, no air bubbles, etc). The new EZ apply tray attachment made it super easy though!! No bubbles, no dust particles and its straight. This is the same brand screen protector I have had on my phone for 2-3 years so I know it will last a long time again!
customer_reviews.author: MariAnna Hinojosa

customer_reviews.title: Good screen protector for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality screen protector. Relatively easy to install. Took a while to fully adhere. Would like greater screen coverage.
customer_reviews.author: CCC

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation nice visual clarity
customer_reviews.text: Placed this on my daughters X should have done this despite her resistance when I bought her phone in December for college it was already scratched when I put on cover. She thought it would hamper the clarity but instead it gives it more hi-definition. All I have to say is next phone on your dollar babe.
customer_reviews.author: Karen E.

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent QC, otherwise a great product.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these at separate dates (about tow-three weeks apart). The first one was great, worthy of a 5-star review. The second one, however, is the reason I’m writing this at all. The first one came with a setting tray and instructions. Very well-packaged and easy to install. The second one was missing the tray and instructions, which made setting the protector evenly on the surface much more difficult. I’m not sure why both were different when I ordered the same product (went to my orders and reordered), and that lack of quality control makes me nervous to buy another of this brand again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Owen

customer_reviews.title: Zagg is the best
customer_reviews.text: I love Zagg products. I've used them on previous phones and is totally worth the money. Amazon offered this protector at a fraction of the original cost and is at no compromise. It does not have a curved in edge like other protectors I've received from Zagg but it was super easy to put on and am stoked to have a cover on my new phone. It does not reach all the way to the edge but does cover the full screen area. I also appreciate the lifetime warranty, as it was super helpful in the past. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: christine tena

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping and product as described
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item because I dropped my iPhone X and it hit the corner of a glass table and the entire screen shattered. When I removed the screen protector I realized that it was the protector that shattered and not my screen! I was shocked and so thankful. I immediately got online and ordered a new one and it arrived in 2 days flat. Then, three days later I dropped my phone between the seat in my car and this screen protector chipped... Maybe it was a fluke or maybe it’s not the same one I had before? I’m ordering another one today either way.
customer_reviews.author: E C

customer_reviews.title: Smoother than factory screen. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: I am terrible at installing glass screen protectors but with the provided tool this was super easy. You lay your phone on its back, put the guide over it, and drop the screen protector in. It was literally that easy for me. It is lined up perfectly with zero bubbles and the glass feels smoother than the glass that came on the phone. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Scottosaurus

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Broke within a week from barely a foot of a drop where I caught it’s fall, shattered the protector and cracked my iPhone X screen on the bottom and below the edges of the protector. I have a hard case on my phone. With the price paid for the product, I would have expected better protection.
customer_reviews.author: Medusa

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Broke on the second day. For the price I’m disappointed. I order a 3 pack from a different brand that last months however they get scratched and it looks dirty. I tried this brand thinking it would be better quality and was disappointed on day two
customer_reviews.author: Anndrea Cooke

customer_reviews.title: Not a free warranty, they make more money on warranty than purchases
customer_reviews.text: Not a free lifetime warranty to consumer, zagg charges $6 to ship and continue zagg profits LIFETIME for themselves In the end, you will give up replacements due to the hassle. They win!
customer_reviews.author: jb

customer_reviews.title: Chipped edges without dropping
customer_reviews.text: It’s already cracked multiple places along edges without ever being dropped. The cracked edge is just sharp enough to give a tiny cut on fingertips (think mini paper cut) that burns but doesn’t bleed. Not what I expect from a Zagg product.
customer_reviews.author: TeacherPresenter

customer_reviews.title: Zagg screen protector is poorly made.
customer_reviews.text: My shield cracked within a week!! So disappointed!! Zagg X's screen protector! Horrible quality
customer_reviews.author: Damigs

customer_reviews.title: No bueno
customer_reviews.text: This screen protector was perfect for about the first 2 months and then one of the sides got air underneath and now there’s a corner of the screen protector that will no longer adhere to my screen. Now I have the right side of my phone with air underneath it and it looks awful. Just spend the money on one that’s more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say,Very very easy to install looks like it’s going to last a while great product. My phone looks Bran new now.
customer_reviews.author: always shopping

customer_reviews.title: Screen lasted about 1 month
customer_reviews.text: Screen lasted about one month before getting chips and scratches that ultimately cracked the screen protector completely. If Invisible Shield actually lived up to their "Lifetime Warranty" and offer of a free replacement, I'd give them 5 Stars. I tried to get my replacement and they've made it impossible to send back the broken screen to qualify. You pay for what you get...
customer_reviews.author: Alexander H Horn

customer_reviews.title: Best choice
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought one of these for every device I have had, and for ones my wife has. Before discovering Zagg’s glass shields, I used others that failed and let me down, now I will never try another product, just Zagg.
customer_reviews.author: Addy Daddy

customer_reviews.title: EZ Apply tray may not fit your phone
customer_reviews.text: This is a good screen protector; clear, smooth, and fairly scratch-resistant. However, I couldn’t get the EZ Apply tray to stay put on the iPhone 11 Pro, so the screen protector came on slightly misaligned. Nevertheless a good product worth the few extra bucks over cheaper screen protectors.
customer_reviews.author: ldgarbinski

customer_reviews.title: Great for your phone
customer_reviews.text: Strongly recommend. After using my first zagg i Ve gotten it for each new phone. Great way to protect your screen and easy to put on
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy S

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING. this product lasted two years. When i received the item, i registered it at Zagg.com and two years later after i dropped my phone and the zagg shield cracked, i received a free replacement! i will never use any other screen protector brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Difficult install and weak adhesive layer
customer_reviews.text: I got to admit, it feels like normal glass and smudges weren’t noticeable while using it. It’s a pain in the tail to install. I’ve gone through three replacements and everytime I go to adjust the protector to fit the screen, the adhesive layer was coming off where I lifted up the protector to take it off causing a never going away bubble in that corner. HIGHLY RECOMMEND the Otterbox Alpha Glass. Originally $40 but you can find it for cheap! Quality product, great install, no smudging and high clarity! Go for the Otterbox Alpha Glass!!!
customer_reviews.author: Parker

customer_reviews.title: Zagg is life
customer_reviews.text: Love zagg. Great brand! The customer service and lifetime guarantee is amazing. I’ve had to replace different screen protectors over the years and never have had any problems.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Cracked in less than a month
customer_reviews.text: I've had it less than a month and it's cracked already. Diagonally from the left center to the right bottom corner. This is the second one that has cracked in the same location. They just don't make Zaggs like they used to.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: I always use Zagg
customer_reviews.text: i have been using zagg products for years and have never had an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Edward & Sadie

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This screen protector was great, arrived quickly and lasted a long amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Roxie

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality
customer_reviews.text: This screen protector is great quality. The glass is extremely smooth and feels offers no resistance when swiping. My favorite part is the placement guide. This is a small piece of plastic that snaps on the phone to guide placement so it isn’t crooked or off-center. Simple idea, but extremely effective.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Mojock

customer_reviews.title: Great protection!
customer_reviews.text: I just got a new iPhone x on Sunday. I came home and immediately ordered this screen protector. It arrived on Wednesday and I put it on the phone. It fit perfectly. Fast forward to Friday evening, I was putting dishes away and a glass lid fell out of the cabinet and hit my phone on the counter. The screen protector shattered but the screen of the phone was completely undamaged! Luckily, I had just registered my screen protector with Zagg and I was able to quickly get online and ordered a replacement for just the cost of shipping (5.99). Very happy with this purchase and company!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: fragile
customer_reviews.text: The screen case cracked within the first day, hadn’t even dropped it? It’s been two weeks and its practically shattered.
customer_reviews.author: Issa Smith

customer_reviews.title: Immediately cracked
customer_reviews.text: I JUST installed this on my phone. I dropped the phone once and immediately it had cracks all across the screen. I am so disappointed. In the past my zaggs held up way better.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A Longo

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit full screen. Too small.
customer_reviews.text: Just bought iPhone XR. While this is a great product, this version does not fit edge to edge. 1/4 “ edge not covered causing a line in the screen. It says it’s case friendly which may be true if you use a case that wraps around to the front but I like slim cases. This shield just doesn’t cover the full screen.
customer_reviews.author: Powser

customer_reviews.title: Scratches immediately
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to like this protector, but it literally scratched after being put in my pocket. The phone screen itself is protected but this protector is prone to being scratched way too easily. Hopefully this review will trigger the vendor to replace my screen, maybe I got a bad batch....but I’ve used lots of screen protectors and have never seen one scratch with divots so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: this product does not apply very easily. I worked at rasioshack for a number of ...
customer_reviews.text: this product does not apply very easily. I worked at rasioshack for a number of years selling cell phones and installing zagg screen protector all the time. the problem with this one is that when you use an otterbox style case on it the sides push up on the screen protector causing it to bubble and then finally come off.
customer_reviews.author: matthewtwist

customer_reviews.title: Highly forgettable!
customer_reviews.text: I put this screen protector on about 15 minutes ago and thought to myself... I need to put that screen protector on... oh yeah it’s already on!
customer_reviews.author: PSS08

customer_reviews.title: Great and cheaper option
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I do notice that it keeps the oils on your fingers a lot more than before. But does it’s job for me.
customer_reviews.author: Montenique Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent brand
customer_reviews.text: Works well and easy to install. The Zagg brand has been great for all of my devices. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Screen Protector
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Have had them before and they protect the hek out of my screen.
customer_reviews.author: L. Caplan

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to put on
customer_reviews.text: While this screen protector is high quality it is much smaller than I expected. It does not cover the front of the phone, on the exact dimensions of the screen. So if you do not manage to align it perfectly it’s worthless
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Works good, not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Easy install, hard to notice any fingerprints, but there are bubbles along the edges that I can squeeze away but come back after a couple minutes
customer_reviews.author: Cade Warner

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: Authentic Zagg product- comes with replacement warranty and a tray that makes installation a breeze. Smudges a bit, but a dab of hand sanitizer cleans it well.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Grippin

customer_reviews.title: It breaks too fast and does not last for long
customer_reviews.text: Has it for a few months and it get chipping away everywhere, lose it attachment to the phone screen and need to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Koby

customer_reviews.title: Crystal clear and saved my phone
customer_reviews.text: This my second zagg screen shield. Highly recommend. Screen still very sharp. First one saved the screen when I dropped the phone and it landed face down on a bolt.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, as expected
customer_reviews.text: Fits my iPhone X perfectly and was super easy to install without bubbles underneath.
customer_reviews.author: The Rogue

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this kind of screen protector for every iPhone I’ve had. It will usually get small scratches and cracks after years of use, but never any damage to my phones.
customer_reviews.author: K. Fratzke

customer_reviews.title: easily cracks
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product a couple of times. First time was not so bad but I did drop the phone and the product with stud the abuse and protected my screen. I bought a second one... Now this is where its frustrating. Placed it on the phone, was perfect. After about 2 days of having it on i noticed stress cracks. Very poor durability from this company. Currently seeking for a new company protector with better durability
customer_reviews.author: Philt

customer_reviews.title: Imperfections and broken glass
customer_reviews.text: Got the box via Amazon prime. Opened it up and noticed imperfections and crack across the top. Went to install and it sticks out like a sore thumb. Why should I have to return it to get another one? Amazon should send a new one at no charge.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A Scott II

customer_reviews.title: Very like the description
customer_reviews.text: Love the ease of installation, has a guide to follow, with a tape to clean lint.
customer_reviews.author: Technoeve

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: I will continue to buy this product for every phone I own!
customer_reviews.author: JEANNETTE MONTGOMERY

customer_reviews.title: Great product for IPhone X
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased many screen protectors before but this was the easiest to install no dust adhered to it no spots very clean
customer_reviews.author: SDreviews

customer_reviews.title: Alignment needs a template.
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat difficult to align correctly and only a small bubble remained on the left side. Not a major problem but a little annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Rice

customer_reviews.title: Hard to install without guide
customer_reviews.text: This product is very hard to install without a tray guide like many other screen protectors now come with. I actually returned this product and purchased a cheaper alternative I found here on Amazon. The Zagg does seem to have slightly higher quality glass but for almost 3 times the price I do not believe it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Probably one of the clearest screen protectors I’ve ever had. However, two weeks after installation,
customer_reviews.text: Probably one of the clearest screen protectors I’ve ever had. However, two weeks after installation, I dropped my phone face down and the screen protector cracked, but in addition to the screen protector absorbing the cracks, it went straight through and my phone also cracked. Wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: BimuBuyStuff

customer_reviews.title: Such an easy product to install
customer_reviews.text: I have loved this product for years, but I normally pay people to put it on. This one came with a guard to help line up, so very easy for me to do myself. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: A.B.

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Screen was easy to put on and works well. No scratches or breaks since putting on. It is still in good shape 3 months later.
customer_reviews.author: Mommymouse

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Literally have a crack after one day and I didn’t even drop my phone. Zagg is usually reliable, so I’m thinking I got a bad one.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley.Gwen

product_meta.title: ZAGG InvisibleShield Glass+ Screen Protector – High-definition Tempered Glass for the Apple iPhone XS/ X – Impact & Scratch Protection
product_meta.description: Color:Clear| Style:ProtectorOur phones screens are the windows to our digital world, and we want a seamless experience as we swipe and type. Nothing delivers that experience quite like the ultra-smooth surface of glass. So to be able to withstand the rigors of our day-to-day lives and the unexpected, we created glass.
feature_bullets: Custom fit – ZAGG’s invisible shield glass screen protector is engineered to fit snugly on the apple iPhone XR. Designed meticulously, this screen protector offers a precise, case-friendly fit for today’s modern screens.
Smooth, silky feel – The precise fit of the ZAGG iPhone screen protector gives it a very smooth feel, allowing easy navigation of all the new features of the iPhone
Scratch & impact protection – The specially designed tempered glass is impact- and scratch-resistant, keeping the phone’s natural screen protected. No shock resistant
Smudge Resistant – The oil-resistant and long-lasting screen is resistant to smudges, keeping it as clean as possible to improve your viewing experience. 100% clarity rating
Precision touch sensitivity – Meticulously tested materials deliver a smooth, premium composition, remarkable touch sensitivity, and high-definition image clarity.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,441 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: InvisibleShield Glass,EZ Apply Tray,Instructions,Microfiber, ClothCleaning Wipe,Dust Removal Sticker
